Html:
The Macro CitationsToStaticText() doesn't work for the styles that I downloaded from this websyte while it perfectly works with the default styles of word. Also the Word's command "convert to static text" for a single citation doesn't work. does anyone know why this happens?
thanks

On top of my head I can only think of one reason: the use of hyperlinks for you in-text citations. Try disabling those and see if that helps.

In the style file, change
<citation_as_link>yes</citation_as_link>
into
<citation_as_link>no</citation_as_link>

perfect, it works!!!
can I also ask what features I'll lose when disabling citation as link?
Thanks!!!
You only loose the ability to click on an in-text citation and automatically go to the entry in the bibliography. Yves On Thu, Sep 5, 2013 at 8:22 AM, giancarlosoavi <[email removed]> wrote:
